entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
